description: Austin Trip just doesn't seem to learn. You'd think by now he'd learn to give it up. He knows the rules, and he knows what is going on. But he has gotten detention again. At least this time he gets to hang out in the gym. And even though he's not much of a gym rat, he decides it's better than detention. After a while his friend, Jason North joins him, and though he isn't much of a gym guy either, before too long the two of them have figured out an activity to pass the time. Seems Austin has a fleshlight, and Jason has never tried one. Turns out, detention wasn't quite long enough today. Enjoy!
title: Fleshlight Detention
